programme.title: Invaders from Mars
programme.desc: A young boy discovers aliens from outer space have landed on Earth. hese aliens are from another world, and have plans for us earthlings. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Dominion
programme.desc: In five days the world changed. As a retired Intelligence agent turned UFO investigator races to discover the fate of the human race, an alien observer searches for the human woman he loves. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: The Crawling Eye
programme.desc: Sisters Sarah & Anne Pilgrim are on their way to Geneva, when Anne feels drawn to a mysterious mountain where a series of decapitations on a Swiss mountainside appear to be connected to a mysterious radioactive cloud. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Our Cosmic Connection to Music
programme.desc: The Big Bang, a video that was conceived and the music composed by Glenna Burmer, covers the 13.8 billion years of our Universe's history, from before the beginning to today. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: Join Walter Lloyd on a trip across the cosmos from the night-side of Earth. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: The stories we're covering today, that will affect our lives tomorrow. Deep Space Technologies, the SCOUT mission, Cosmic Shielding and more... Duration: 3600

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: Turns out, Sky Sharks are entirely possible and the best light saber fights happen in video games! Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Laserblast
programme.desc: A teenager stumbles upon an alien weapon which turns him into a grotesque killer. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Solar System: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Join our host on the International Space Station of the year 2050. Marvel at the three-dimensional sights and learn many things about the astral bodies that surround us. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: A young boy discovers aliens from outer space have landed on Earth. These aliens are under our feet and all around us.. and the floating head has plans for us earthlings! Duration: 7200
